_meta.description: Domain profile for photo, video, and audio manipulation shortcuts

prompt_context: You are generating a media processing Apple Shortcut. Use resizeimage for scaling (specify width/height or fit mode). Use overlayimage for compositing and watermarks. Use getimagedetail to extract EXIF metadata (camera model, date taken, dimensions, location). Use trimvideo for video editing. For batch operations on multiple photos, use FOREACH with getphotos or selectphotos. Always handle the case where the user cancels the photo/video picker.
example_patterns: Select photos, resize to 1024px wide, save to album
Take screenshot, add watermark overlay, share via Messages
Get latest photos, extract EXIF metadata, generate report
